name: Jubilee Campaign
membership: Member of the North Korea Freedom Coalition and the Religious Liberty Platform.
goal: Jubilee Campaign promotes the human rights and religious liberty of ethnic and religious minorities around the world because we value freedom and democracy and our right to choose, speak, and believe. We document human rights abuses and advocate with consultative status at the United Nations.
interests: External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
- We collaborate with various like-minded NGOs on topics of religious freedom. Alliance Defending Freedom is an NGO with whom we make efforts to raise the concerns of Christians and religious minorities in the Middle-East.
- We have had assistance of individual MEPs who wanted to endorse our reports on persecution in several countries.
